skill_constraints: Single points of failure in DevOps and Frontend.
resource_bottlenecks: DevOps Engineer in Sprint 1, Frontend Developer in Sprint 2.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize critical path tasks, utilize Tech Lead for reviews, proactive dependency management.

skill_constraints: Onboarding and coordination overhead for new contractor.
resource_bottlenecks: Coordination and communication between core team and contractor.
mitigation_strategies: Hire a part-time DevOps contractor to parallelize infrastructure and CI/CD setup.

skill_constraints: Same as baseline, but reduced pressure.
mitigation_strategies: Defer Real-Time GPS Tracking epic (US-029) to a future phase to reduce Sprint 3 complexity and risk.
